Bosses.Name: Void Soulcounter
Bosses.Strategy: Appears after the destruction of each sealed barrier.

Bosses.Name: Denn the Orcatoothed
Bosses.Strategy: Summons 3 waves of adds during the fight. The imps make Galvanth immune to damage, so prioritize killing them before killing the other adds. Attacks from the imps will interrupt spell casting.

Mechanics.Name: Shielded
Mechanics.Description: Cannot be damaged whilst imps are alive.
